\# Abstract

Here, I re-examine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupel (2002).

Life Expectancy Analysis

I am importing the data set from gapminder and then finding the top life expectancy per year, and then creating a data frame that holds the country and year for the higest life expectancy overall.

I am making a small change to this file to see if I can get this to work.

```{r}

gapminder1 <- gapminder::gapminder_unfiltered
```

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE

analysis <- gapminder1 |>
  select(country, year, lifeExp) |>
  group_by(year) |>
  slice_max(lifeExp, n = 1, with_ties = FALSE) |>
  ungroup()
  
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

sumdat <- analysis |>
  slice_max(lifeExp, n = 1, with_ties = FALSE)

sumdat
```
